body_html: If this isn't how others are structuring their code, then there is no urgency/necessity. I have been pre-computing the number of enqueue()'s that will be performed in an epoch, and then running the consumer the appropriate number of times, with asserts that the producer is not alive and the queue is empty before starting the next epoch.
